articles.title: Edible oil prices may fall as domestic arrival of seeds expected to pick up
articles.description: The country, which is heavily dependent on imports, had suffered because of a drop in production in Argentina and Brazil as well as reduction in palm oil production in Malaysia and Indonesia.
articles.content: Prices of edible oil are set to soften as domestic arrival of oil seeds is expected to improve soon. Meanwhile, in response to an appeal by Atul Chaturvedi, president of Solvent and Extractors’ Association of India (SEA), member companies have starte... [1759 chars]

articles.title: Maradona lived many lives in one life: Maradona Blessed Dream actor Nazareno Casero
articles.description: Maradona: Blessed Dream charts Maradona's humble beginnings in Argentina, his game-changing career through Barcelona and Napoli, and his role in taking his national team to win the World Cup in Mexico in 1986.
articles.content:
It was a roller-coaster ride for actors Nazareno Casero and Juan Palomino to play Diego Maradona in Maradona: Blessed Dream, a show that explores different facets of the soccer legend’s life.

articles.title: Lithium Americas makes $400 million bid for Millennial to rival China's CATL
articles.description: Lithium Americas Corp made a $400 million stock-and-cash offer for Argentina-focused lithium developer Millennial Lithium Corp on Monday, seeking to outbid China's Contemporary Amperex Technology Co Ltd (CATL) for a promising source of the ultra-light battery metal.

articles.title: Argentina exported $2.417 bln in farm products in October - CIARA-CEC
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Nov 1 (Reuters) - Argentine exports of grain, oilseeds and their derivatives totaled $2.417 billion in October, the country's CIARA-CEC chamber of oilseed crushers and export companies said in a report on Monday.CIARA-CEC said the amount of exports represented a decrease of 1% compared with the previous month and an increase of 40.8% compared to the same month
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Nov 1 (Reuters) - Argentine exports of grain, oilseeds and their derivatives totaled $2.417 billion in October, the country's CIARA-CEC chamber of oilseed crushers and export companies said in a report on Monday.

articles.title: Argentina's crop weather to offer some relief
articles.description: Portions of the soybean growing regions of Argentina will receive needed rain in the first week of November 2021.

articles.title: Argentina spends weekend celebrating late hero Maradona
articles.description: Argentine football is gearing up for a weekend of celebrations to mark the birthday of its late star Diego Maradona.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES – Argentine football is gearing up for a weekend of celebrations to mark the birthday of its late star Diego Maradona, with matches across the country being paused and clubs and fans dressing to remember the controversial superstar.
